title: Google icons
description: Over 2,500 glyphs in a single font file with a wide range of design variants.

title: Tabler icons
description: Free and open source icons designed to make your website or app attractive, visually consistent and simply beautiful.

title: Iconify
description: All popular icon sets, one framework. Over 150,000 open source vector icons.
licence: MIT. This license does not apply to all icons, Icon sets use various open source licenses, see each icon set for details.

title: Hero icons
description: Beautiful hand-crafted SVG icons, by the makers of Tailwind CSS.

title: Remix icons
description: Remix Icon is a set of open source neutral style system symbols elaborately crafted for designers and developers.

title: Simple icons
description: 2449 Free SVG icons for popular brands

title: svgl
description: A beautiful library with SVG logos.

title: css.gg
description: Open-source CSS, SVG and Figma UI Icons, Available in SVG Sprite, styled-components, NPM & API

title: Ikonate
description: Customise, adjust and download free vector icons.

title: SVGrepo
licence: Multiple licenses (SVG Repo License, CC0, MIT...)

title: Iconmonstr
description: Free simple icons for your next project
licence: "Licensee may use the Work in non-commercial and commercial projects, services or products without attribution."

title: Iconoir
description: Iconoir is the biggest open source icon library that provides a massive selection of high-quality icons.

title: MingCute
description: MingCute Icon is a set of simple and exquisite open-source icon library.

title: Boxicons
description: Boxicons is a free collection of carefully crafted open source icons.

title: Fontawesome
description: Search all of Font Awesome's free and Open Source icons.
licence: The free versions (all versions up to 4 and the free version for 5) are available under the SIL Open Font License 1.1, Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 and MIT License

title: Keyicons
description: The clean icon set you were looking for, ready to use in web, mobile development and wherever you want.

title: Health icons
description: Free, open source health icons. Use in your next commercial or personal project. No need to give credit.

title: Zwicon
description: The zwicon icon library was made to support our work @zwoelf. Now it is available for free for download.
